subtitleNullable: 为了方便个人使用而上传的清华大学RSCD数据集，原网址：https://thu-rsxd.com/rscd/
descriptionNullable: The prior knowledge of road surface states is essential for improving the safety and ride comfort of autonomous vehicles. Previewing road conditions with vision sensor is verified to be an effective solution. However, there is still a lack of a large-scale road surface image dataset. We release this Road Surface Classification Dataset (RSCD), which is the first dataset in this field containing 1 million image samples with detailed road material, friction and unevenness level annotations.
title: RSCD dataset-1million
subtitle: 为了方便个人使用而上传的清华大学RSCD数据集，原网址：https://thu-rsxd.com/rscd/
description: The prior knowledge of road surface states is essential for improving the safety and ride comfort of autonomous vehicles. Previewing road conditions with vision sensor is verified to be an effective solution. However, there is still a lack of a large-scale road surface image dataset. We release this Road Surface Classification Dataset (RSCD), which is the first dataset in this field containing 1 million image samples with detailed road material, friction and unevenness level annotations.
